title: Going To The S Rank Zone (Part 4)
body:
Going To The S Rank Zone (Part 4)

'Where is that female S rank hunter?' Evan thought after seeing Damian's condition.

He did not know what happened on the front line, but he was sure that if the situation continue to go on like this, it will not be long before the front line completely collapse.

After looking around he noticed powerful mana waves coming from the distance.

Seeing the mana waves it did not take him long to understand where Amanda was.

'She must be fighting against the S rank monster' Evan thought because he knew in the monster tide, there was one S rank monster

He pondered for some time and after hesitating for a moment, he ordered Eclipse to go in the direction from where mana waves were coming.

He also reminded it to stop at a safe distance from them.

Hearing Evan, Eclipse started to move in Amanda's direction carefully.

The front line was very chaotic and both hunters and monsters were fighting with everything they got.
